question: Do you feel comfortable with managing people?

answers.description: Product Manager is a person who takes care of the entire product, from its creation to sale, who is responsible for the quality, price and market analysis.

question: Do you prefer to focus on the entire project with its logistics than on a single fragment?

answers.description: Project Manager is a person that mainly manages the project, but not only takes care of good planning, but also its execution. This person has to manage budget, time and monitors risks. What is more, in this job it is important to have a very good attitude to people.
Scrum Master is a person that is responsible for the success of scrum of the group. This person must support its team and remove obstacles that arise by caring for all memebers of the project.
